reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Game changer of a pillow
reviews.reviewText: Recently got this pillow because i realized my sleeping habits werent getting me a great sleep so I wanted a pillow with more support. I want to say this pillow is super ideal with me, not only do I not roll around as much during the night, my head stays in the same position and is well supported in all positions, but I'm mostly a back/ side sleeper. On the side, my head gets great comfort as it properly distances my shoulders and my face and gives it a very comfortable shelf. I also find the material to be adquate. This isn't a cooling foam, its fairly simply memory foam, and youre head will sink into it, as long as your room is adquately heated or cooled, you shouldn't run into a problem with the foam. And despite its weird shape it fits well within a pillow case so that's a huge plus. I've had so many better nights of sleep with this product than I have had with a pillow like tempurpedic tempu ergo, although, i wouldn't be surprised if they came out with a similar product soon.
